com.exlibris.dps.sdk.deposit

Interface DepositWebServices

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.exlibris.core.infra.svc.api.GenericWebService

    public interface DepositWebServices
extends com.exlibris.core.infra.svc.api.GenericWebService
    DepositWebServices defines the Web services that enable depositing an item in the system and retrieving information on deposits.
    Author:
    zvif

      API for submitting a deposit

    • Method Detail

      • submitDepositActivity

        java.lang.String submitDepositActivity(java.lang.String pdsHandle,
                                     java.lang.String materialFlowId,
                                     java.lang.String subDirectoryName,
                                     java.lang.String producerId,
                                     java.lang.String depositSetId)
        API for submitting a deposit
        Parameters:
        pdsHandle - of a logged in user
        materialFlowId - of the material flow used
        subDirectoryName - of the load directory
        producerId - of the Producer
        depositSetId - ID of the set of deposits
        Returns:
        an XML with the reply to the request that includes
        1. isError - true/false
        2. messageCode - of error
        3. messageDesc - of error
        4. sipId - if no error, new SIP ID
        5. depositActivityId - if no error, new deposit activity ID
        6. userParams - that were submitted with request
        7. creationDate
        Example:
        <xb:deposit_result xmlns:xb="http://com/exlibris/digitool/deposit/service/xmlbeans">
        <xb:isError>true</xb:isError>
        <xb:messageCode xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/>
        <xb:messageDesc>MaterialFlow with id 6 does not exist in DB.</xb:messageDesc>
        <xb:userParams>pdsHandle=202200816413213002020082413216, materialFlowId=6, subDirectoryName=deposit - 4 - dc - complex, producerId=1, depositSetId=1</xb:userParams>
        <xb:creationDate xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/>
        </xb:deposit_result>

      • getDepositActivityBySubmitDate

        java.lang.String getDepositActivityBySubmitDate(java.lang.String pdsHandle,
                                              java.lang.String depositActivityStatus,
                                              java.lang.String producerID,
                                              java.lang.String producerAgentID,
                                              java.lang.String submitDateFrom,
                                              java.lang.String submitDateTo,
                                              java.lang.String startRecord,
                                              java.lang.String endRecord)
        API for retrieving a list of deposit activities according to the submission date
        Parameters:
        pdsHandle - of a logged in user, mandatory
        depositActivityStatus - All, In process, Rejected, Draft, Approved, Declined
        producerID - A Producer ID if requesting for a specific Producer
        producerAgentID - A Producer Agent ID if requesting for a specific Producer Agent
        submitDateFrom - The requested period start date, mandatory
        submitDateTo - The requested period end date, mandatory
        startRecord - Used for pagination
        endRecord - Used for pagination
        Returns:
        an XML with the reply to the request, which includes the list of requested deposit activities according to the submission date The reply is created by deposit_activity_list.xsd and has an xmlBeans to parse the reply.

      • getDepositActivityByUpdateDate

        java.lang.String getDepositActivityByUpdateDate(java.lang.String pdsHandle,
                                              java.lang.String depositActivityStatus,
                                              java.lang.String producerID,
                                              java.lang.String producerAgentID,
                                              java.lang.String updateDateFrom,
                                              java.lang.String updateDateTo,
                                              java.lang.String startRecord,
                                              java.lang.String endRecord)
        API for retrieving a list of deposit activities according to the update date
        Parameters:
        pdsHandle - of a logged in user, mandatory
        depositActivityStatus - All, In process, Rejected, Draft, Approved, Declined
        producerID - A Producer ID if requesting for a specific Producer
        producerAgentID - A Producer Agent ID if requesting for a specific Producer Agent
        submitDateFrom - The requested period start date, mandatory
        submitDateTo - The requested period end date, mandatory
        startRecord - Used for pagination
        endRecord - Used for pagination
        Returns:
        an XML with the reply to the request, which includes the list of requested deposit activities according to the update date The reply is created by deposit_activity_list.xsd and has an xmlBeans to parse the reply.
